actions.text: On agreeing to the Daines amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment strikes the portion of Section 8132 which states that Section 8132 shall continue in effect through the date of enactment of an Act authorizing appropriations for fiscal year 2015 for military activities of the Department of Defense.
purpose: An amendment to strike the provisions of Section 8132 which instruct the section continue in effect through the date of enactment of an Act authorizing appropriations for fiscal year 2015 for military activities of the Department of Defense.
